result.execSummary:
The defendant James Jeffrey Sheffield was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. James Jeffrey Sheffield is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • James Jeffrey Sheffield was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. James Jeffrey Sheffield

defendant.name: Sheffield, James Jeffrey
defendant.address: 22020 Jivaro Street NW, Oak Grove, MN 55303

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: c: Def, Atty, DA & HPD. eif

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA:  Megan E. Kelly   DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski   DF:  James Jeffrey Sheffield appeared.  Court called at 10:00 p.m. Set for CT.  There is an agreement.   Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights.   Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea.  Court reads charge and maximum penalty.  DE pleads No Contest to Ct 4.  No Contest plea is entered.  Court reviews the Hudson police report.  Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE adjudicated guilty of Ct 4. On motion of the State, Crt dismisses Ct 1, Ct 2, & Ct 3. Sentencing arguments. Crt orders:

F/F of $250.00 apply money on file
- 20 days to appeal

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Megan E. Kelly, DF ATTY: John A. Kucinski, DF: James Jeffrey Sheffield appeared.  Court called at 10:35 a.m.  ADA Kelly advises there is no agreement.  Set out for Court Trial.  Bail is continued.  Court adjourned at 10:36 a.m. lw  Court trial scheduled for December 18, 2015 at 10:00 am.

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Kenneth N. Sortedahl, DF ATTY: John A. Kucinski, DF:  James Jeffrey Sheffield appeared.  Court called at 2:40 p.m.  Attorneys are working on a resolution.  Bail is continued.  Court adjourned at 2:42 .m. lw  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 5, 2015 at 10:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for James Jeffrey Sheffield
Current: 3948 Van Nest Avenue S., Minneapolis, MN 55409 United States  (Effective: 07-02-2015)
Prior: 77 Coulee Rd., Apt. 110, Hudson, WI 54016 
per Defendant in court. eif

Bond on file.

-It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,  Rebekah S.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

-Zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

Further, it is ordered that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis Stats.

CO: EJL, RPR: Val Deiss, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:  Kenneth N. Sortedahl,  DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski,  DF:  James Jeffrey Sheffield appeared. Court confirms address. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 27, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
